reviewText: Great period pieces from a bygone age and excellent for Russian language learners. Sluzhebnii Roman is the better of the two and Alyssa Freindlikh's performance as the repressed department head steals the show.
Fun movies if you like old "Soviet Era" Russian Comedy.. I watched these to help with my Russian Language studies. Last scene of Business romance is particularly engaging.
Love these classics! Arrived way faster than estimated! All regions.
These cult movies don't need my review. Bought for subtitles to show my yanky kids. Very weak translation, getting progressively worse as movies advance. Very clean video to dvd coversion though.
2  Most Popular Russian-Language Comedy with english subtitles

The Irony of Fate is charming throughout.

Office Romance is the best romantic comedy ever. That's right: ever! Alisa Freindlich (without doubt the finest actress in the world) and Andrey Myagkov are amazing. My favorite movie for the last 12 years. How pleased I am to have finally gotten a version with English subtitles.

A bonus to  this set is getting to watch the talented Andrey Myagkov play two comic roles that are nonetheless quite different.
